FuncDef: The display accounting-scheme command displays the configuration of accounting schemes, including accounting scheme names and accounting modes. The display accounting-scheme command displays the configuration of accounting schemes, including accounting scheme names and accounting modes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an accounting scheme.
The accounting scheme must already exist.

ExtraInfo: After the accounting scheme configuration is complete, run the display accounting-scheme command to view the configuration of accounting schemes.Before applying an accounting scheme to a domain, run the display accounting-scheme command to check whether configuration of the accounting scheme is correct.
